title: Reverse a Stack
challenge: Write a function to reverse the given stack without using the built-in reverse method.

title: Balanced Parentheses
challenge: Implement a function that checks if a given string has balanced parentheses.

title: Next Greater Element
challenge: Find the next greater element for each element in the array using a stack.

title: Sort a Stack
challenge: Sort a stack using recursion only (no loops allowed).

title: Stack Minimum Element
challenge: Implement a function to get the minimum element of a stack in O(1) time.

title: Implement Stack Using Queue
challenge: Build a stack using only one queue data structure.

title: Palindrome Using Stack
challenge: Use a stack to check whether a string is palindrome.

title: Stack Using Linked List
challenge: Implement stack operations using a linked list.

title: Evaluate Postfix Expression
challenge: Write a program to evaluate postfix expressions using a stack.

title: Reverse a String Using Stack
challenge: Reverse a string using only stack operations.

title: Implement Queue Using Stack
challenge: Implement a queue using two stacks.

title: Valid HTML Tags
example: Use stack to check opening/closing tags in '<html><body></body></html>'.
challenge: Write a function to verify if HTML tags are properly nested.

title: Stock Span Problem
challenge: Solve stock span using a stack to find consecutive smaller prices.

title: Celebrity Problem
example: Find celebrity using stack who is known by everyone but knows no one.
challenge: Implement a function that finds the celebrity using stack elimination.

title: Next Smaller Element
example: Similar to next greater but find next smaller number.
challenge: Find next smaller element to right using stack.

title: Span of Binary Matrix
example: Use stack to find max rectangle area in binary matrix.
challenge: Find largest rectangle of 1â€™s in a binary matrix using histogram logic.

title: Rain Water Trapping
example: Use stack to calculate trapped water between bars.
challenge: Given heights, calculate total trapped rainwater using stack.

title: Decode String
example: Given '3[a2[b]]' -> 'abbabbabb' using stack.
challenge: Use stack to decode strings with nested patterns like 2[abc3[d]].

title: Expression Conversion
example: Convert infix to postfix using stack.
challenge: Write a function to convert infix expression to postfix.

title: Histogram Max Area
example: Find largest area in histogram using stack.
challenge: Implement the histogram area problem using stack logic.
